answers.answer: I have type 1 diabetes and I have 5 beautiful children.  I had to increase medications during pregnancy and was induced for the first two and c-section for the others.  I didnt seem to have trouble conceiving, but before each one, doc wanted my blood sugar under control.  If she has other questions feel free to message me.  I have a little experience with it...lol.

question: My daughter is 27 and her and her husband have been trying to get pregnant.   She was recently diagnosed with diabetes.   Anyone had any success stories I can boost her hope with?   They say it's hard to ovulate when you are diabetic.   Don't know the extent yet as to what type or what she will need to do to control it.  Any help would be appreciated.
title: Diabetes and trying to get pregnant
